text: Teatro Real (Royal Theatre) or simply El Real, is a major opera house in Madrid, Spain. It was founded in 1818 and opened on 19 November 1850. It closed in 1925 and reopened in 1966. It has 1,746 seats. Today the Teatro Real opera is one of the great theaters of Europe. ==References== Category:Opera houses Category:Buildings and structures in Madrid
title: Teatro Real
